u:update.u:name: ADF Mobile Persistence Sample
u:update.u:author: Oracle Fusion Middleware A-Team (Steven Davelaar)
u:update.u:description: This sample contains generic, reusable code that significantly eases and speeds up the development of Oracle ADF Mobile applications that need to support offline usage. The sample code contains object-relational mapping functionality which makes it easy to cache data securely on the on-device SQLite database. In addition, a data synchronization feature is provided to allow for offline data changes that need to be synched with a remote server. After you installed this extension, a readme file will be displayed that explains how to get started.
